channel.title: Npc Position Face Update
channel.description: Already asked this but lost the help i got from Roger i think so does anyone know what makes the npcs reset the facing position like every half sec after a few monsters were killed. What ive noticed is when a new monster respawns, all npcs reset their facing position normally south so ive looked thru countless shit and couldnt find anything so does anyone know were this is occuring? Ktanksbie!
